subtitle: A light refreshing dish, ideal for a summer lunch or supper, that can be served hot or cold.

method.text: Slice the courgettes. Place in a casserole dish and toss in half the olive oil. Cover and cook on 100% (FULL) power for 3-4 min.
Put the pasta into a very large casserole dish or bowl, add the remaining oil and pour on boiling water to cover well. Season then cover. Cook on 100% (FULL) power until boiling.
Reduce to 50% (MEDIUM) power and cook for a further 7-8 min until al dente, stirring once or twice. Drain well.
Spoon the pasta into a warmed serving dish with the courgettes, tuna and avocado. Season to taste.
Whisk together all the ingredients for the vinaigrette and pour over the pasta and vegetables. Toss well and serve.

title: Pasta quills with tuna and courgettes - microwave
